meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Hardy Clervil Cathy Harding Neil Uspal Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7450.

td.p: Hardy Clervil, a customer service manager from Brooklyn, New York
Cathy Harding, a newspaper reporter and substitute teacher from Deer Lodge, Montana
Neil Uspal, a pediatric emergency medicine physician from Seattle, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,400)

tr.td: IT'S ALL RELATIVE
PARTS OF SPEECH
MUST "C" TV
ALSO A CANDY BAR
STREETS
THE ART OF LEARNING AT RISD
(Alex: That's the Rhode Island School of Design.)

LITERARY HEROINES
MATH IN THE MOVIES

A LEAGUE OF THEIR OWN
"P"s AND "Q"s
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letter "P" and there will be a "Q" in there somewhere.)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
